originalText.text: As someone who has been suffering from back pain for many years, I cannot recommend Dr. Frazier enough. From my initial consultation to my post-surgery appointments, he has made me feel at ease and confident in his abilities. What set him apart from other doctors was he took time to thoroughly evaluate me and surgery was not his first option. His approach showed me his commitment to providing me with the best care. He made me feel comfortable throughout the entire process, and his staff is attentive and friendly. Dr. Frazier cares about his patients well-being and I would highly recommend him to anyone in need of back pain management or surgery.

originalText.text: Dr. Frazier changed my life. I had 24 hour chronic nerve pain for three years from the waist down.  After having Dr. Fraizer's surgery, I woke up with Zero nerve pain and it has been a year to the date (January 10, 2023). I am now able to take care of my two toddlers, get back to my dance world and live LIFE! THANK YOU DR. FRAIZER. I am your biggest fan and appreciate you for LIFE.

originalText.text:
Dr. Frazier was the best thing that happened to me. I came to him after months of injections for pain that were not working. After about 5k in useless treatment I found dr. Frazier.

He has great bedside manners, explains thoroughly what is going on and what the options are. I have multiple back problems and he went for conservative approaches where it was possible and didn't really rush to surgery. I did choose to move fast and he did.

My surgery was done in 3 weeks from me signaling I was ready. His staff, Rosie and Elana, are amazing, supportive and helpful. They were really great and this is the best doctor I have seen.

originalText.text: After obtaining 5 “second opinions” from various doctors concerning my spinal cord issue, I was recommended to see Dr Frazier by my acupuncturist.  Dr Frazier happened to be one of the world’s leading surgeons to work with my condition.  After many had told me that I would need surgery and would be left with ONLY 30 - 40% range of movement in my neck, Dr Frazier made it so that I had almost perfectly FULL motion.  Something about him made him stand out from all other surgeons I had visited.  I felt I could trust him and appreciated his level of honesty yet ability to share difficult news in a way that didn’t incite panic in me.  There were also many daily life activities such as riding roller coasters with my kids that other doctors couldn’t ensure I’d be able to do after surgery.  Dr Frazier made it so that I went from being a woman close to being permanently paralyzed to being a woman who could go back to living life as normal enjoying it with her2 children and husband.  I am grateful to Dr Frazier for giving me my life back.

originalText.text: Dr. Frazier was the most professional and trust worthy doctor that I’ve ever seen.  During my pre-check at the hospital various staff members were impressed and excited that Dr. Frazier was my surgeon.  One hospital radiologist said he’s the best in the business, and hoped he got scheduled for my surgery.  He’s clearly highly regarded and respected in his field.  His office staff is as friendly as can be, and communication was very easy.
